name: Men's Jita 4-4 Crew Pants
description: A vast number of workers make up the crew of a station as large and sprawling as Jita 4-4 and PKN Interstellar has been sure not to forget their vital contribution to the expansion project. To forge a common spirit of purpose and cohesion in the workplace, the teeming masses of Jita 4-4 workers have been issued with new crew uniforms including matching tops, pants and shoes. The durable yet distinctive workwear celebrates the contribution of the crew force of Jita 4-4 and is a mark of the prowess of the worker class of the most important station in New Eden.
